name: $invalid
desc: An authentication/authorization/permissions issue of some kind.

name: $security
desc: Processing issues. These are expected to be final e.g. there is no point resubmitting the same content unchanged.

name: $processing
desc: Transient processing issues. The system receiving the message may be able to resubmit the same content once an underlying issue is resolved.

name: $transient
desc: A message unrelated to the processing success of the completed operation (examples of the latter include things like reminders of password expiry, system maintenance times, etc.).
